===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[hit]]; to [[bump]] against; to [[strike]]; to [[run into]]; to [[collide]]
#* {{zh-x|她 被 車 撞 了。|She was '''hit''' by a car.}}
#* {{zh-x|我 在 黑暗 中 撞 上 了 一 把 椅子。|In the dark I '''bumped into''' a chair.}}
#* {{zh-x|瓶子 撞 到 了 牆 上。|The bottle '''smashed''' against a wall.}}
# to [[meet]] by chance; to [[bump into]]; to [[come across]]; to [[encounter]]
#* {{zh-x|在 碰到 你 之前，我 剛剛 撞 上 他。|I just '''ran into''' him before I met you.}}
